bug.short_desc: simpletreedatamodel: missing batch update column data method

long_desc.thetext:
Hi,
I was a bit surprised about the poor performance of the setValue() method before I discovered that setData() is also called when we use this function.
In my example, I created at first stage a button allowing bulk updates on a user-specified column of a treevirtual widget by using the setValue() in a loop. It's of course really inefficient but as I said, I wasn't aware of the setData() call.
So, maybe it would be better to :
* notice in the api docs that the setValue isn't indicated for bulk updates. * and/or provide a method in the simpletreedatamodel that call first setColumnData on all rows and then call setData.
How do you rate it?
Best,
Benoît.
